title: Advanced Grammar: Verbals and Voice

vocab.definition: A verb form that functions as another part of speech
A verb form ending in -ing that functions as a noun
A verb form that functions as an adjective
When the subject performs the action
When the subject receives the action

teachingNotes: Practice identifying verbals in sentences. Show how active voice creates stronger, clearer writing than passive voice.

sample.question: What is a verb form that functions as another part of speech?

truefalse.question: A gerund is a verb form ending in -ing that acts as a noun.

multiplechoice.question: When the subject performs the action, what voice is used?

fillintheblank.question: A verb form that functions as an adjective is a ________.

shortanswer.question: Identify the gerund in this sentence: 'Swimming is my favorite activity.'
